entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Tofino
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Risk of hail and thunderstorms early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming east 20 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
